description: Analyzes for Human Interface Guideline violations, minimum functionality requirements, API usage restrictions, background mode misuse, and performance/crash risks

violations.title: Private API Usage Detected
violations.description: App uses private UIKit API _UIStatusBarForegroundView which is not allowed
